title: Manage a Power Outage at the Stadium
description: A power outage occurs at the stadium during a game, affecting the lights and scoreboards.

tasks.description: The stadium's backup generators automatically kick in to power emergency lighting.
tasks.expected_outcome: The backup power system activates as expected.

tasks.description: Contact the local utility company to report the outage and get an estimated time for restoration.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gets an ETR from the utility company.

tasks.description: Use the battery-powered PA system to inform fans in the stadium of the situation.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent makes an announcement to the crowd.

tasks.description: Coordinate with the league and officials to determine if the game can be safely continued or must be suspended.
tasks.expected_outcome: A decision is made to suspend the game until power is fully restored.
